item.title: 中国电动汽车新贵蔚来计划削减10%的职位
item.description:
Chinese electric vehicle (EV) upstart Nio (9866.HK) plans to eliminate 10% of its jobs, the company said on Friday.翻译:中国电动汽车 (EV) 新贵蔚来汽车(9866.HK)周五表示，该公司计划裁员 10%。

The adjustments will be completed in November, Nio said in a statement, without disclosing the exact number of affected staffers.翻译:蔚来在一份声明中表示，调整将于 11 月完成，但未透露受影响员工的具体人数。

"We still have a gap between our overall performance and expectations," the company said, adding that it needs to improve efficiency and ensure adequate resources.翻译:该公司表示：“我们的整体业绩与预期仍有差距。”并补充说，需要提高效率并确保充足的资源。

Reporting by Zhang Yan, Qiaoyi Li and Brenda Goh Editing by Tomasz Janowski翻译:张岩、李巧一、Brenda Goh 报道 Tomasz Janowski 编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国欧盟商会批评即将举行的上海贸易博览会是“政治展示”
item.description:
The European Union Chamber of Commerce on Friday criticised an upcoming trade fair in China as being more of a "political showcase" than about doing business and pushed for more tangible measures to restore confidence among European companies.翻译:欧盟商会周五批评即将在中国举行的贸易博览会更多的是“政治展示”，而不是做生意，并推动采取更切实的措施来恢复欧洲企业的信心。

Shanghai is due to host the China International Import Expo (CIIE) between Nov. 5-10, an annual event launched by President Xi Jinping in 2018 to promote the country's free trade credentials and tackle criticism of its trade surplus with many partners.翻译:上海将于 11 月 5 日至 10 日举办中国国际进口博览会 (CIIE)，这是习近平主席于 ​​2018 年发起的年度盛会，旨在宣传中国的自由贸易资格，并解决对其与许多合作伙伴的贸易顺差的批评。

Premier Li Qiang is set to address attendees at the event's opening ceremony on Sunday, which is expected to include Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese.翻译:李强总理将于周日在活动开幕式上向与会者发表讲话，预计澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞将出席。

But the chamber said that contrary to the CIIE's ambitions of boosting China's global imports and showcasing the country's opening up and reform agenda, China's trade surplus with Europe had grown significantly over the past five years.翻译:但该商会表示，与进博会推动中国全球进口、展示中国开放改革议程的雄心相反，过去五年中国对欧洲的贸易顺差大幅增长。

"It's more a government affairs event, more a marketing event and there's been really little said on business. You can say CIIE has become more of a political showcase rather than a business event," Carlo D'Andrea, the chamber's vice president, told reporters at a briefing in Shanghai.翻译:“这更多的是一场政府事务活动，更多的是一场营销活动，关于商业的话题真的很少。可以说，进博会已经更多地成为一场政治展示，而不是商业活动，”中国商会副会长卡洛·德安德里亚(Carlo D'Andrea)告诉记者。记者在上海举行吹风会。

"European businesses are becoming disillusioned as symbolic gestures take the place of tangible results needed to restore business confidence," he said.翻译:他表示：“欧洲企业正在幻灭，因为象征性的姿态取代了恢复商业信心所需的切实成果。”

The fair's organisers did not immediately respond to a request for comment. China has said it is willing to take more European exports in response to complaints from the European Union about the lack of a level playing field in China and the politicization of the business environment.翻译:展会组织者没有立即回应置评请求。中国表示愿意接受更多欧洲出口，以回应欧盟对中国缺乏公平竞争环境和商业环境政治化的抱怨。

The EU and China plan a summit by the end of the year. The European Union's top diplomat, Josep Borrell, visited last month, as have several other top EU officials in recent months.翻译:欧盟和中国计划在今年年底前举行峰会。欧盟最高外交官何塞普·博雷尔(Josep Borrell)上个月访问了该国，其他几位欧盟高级官员近几个月也访问了该国。

A survey by the chamber last month that received 116 responses from its members found that participation rates had dropped from 42% to 32% since the first CIIE. Those who had opted not to attend this year after attending previously cited the diminishing value of investment and limited policy changes as among their reasons.翻译:商会上个月进行的一项调查收到了116份会员的回复，发现自首届进博会以来，参与率已从42%下降至32%。那些在参加过之后选择今年不参加的人表示，投资价值下降和政策变化有限是他们的原因。

Although 59% of the survey's respondents said they benefited from government engagement at the show, only a quarter of attendees closed any business deals at last year's CIIE, significantly lower than in 2018 when half of participants closed deals, the chamber added.翻译:该商会补充说，尽管59%的受访者表示他们从政府参与展会中受益，但只有四分之一的与会者在去年的进博会上达成了任何商业交易，显着低于2018年，当时有一半的与会者达成了交易。

European businesses would like to see the CIIE "move away from the politicization" and focus on the business impact, as well as undertake concrete policy measures to open the market alongside the fair, the chamber added.翻译:该商会补充说，欧洲企业希望看到进博会“摆脱政治化”，关注对企业的影响，并在进博会的同时采取具体的政策措施开放市场。

More than 60 countries and three international organisations, as well as 289 of the world's top 500 companies, will be participating in CIIE, according to Chinese state media, including firms such as Micron (MU.O), Nestle and Burberry (BRBY.L)翻译:据中国官方媒体报道，超过 60 个国家和三个国际组织以及世界 500 强企业中的 289 家将参加进博会，其中包括美光(MU.O) 、雀巢和巴宝莉(BRBY.L ) 等公司）

Last year, $73.52 billion worth of 'intentional' deals were signed at the fair, up 3.9%.翻译:去年，展会上签署了价值 735.2 亿美元的“意向”交易，增长 3.9%。

($1 = 7.3142 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.3142 人民币）

Reporting by Brenda Goh; Editing by Sonali Paul翻译:布伦达·吴报道；索纳利·保罗编辑
item.author: Brenda Goh

item.title: 俄罗斯驳斥美国新制裁：“你永远无法击败莫斯科”
item.description:
Russia on Friday dismissed new U.S. sanctions over the war in Ukraine, saying that the United States would never defeat Moscow, while the boss of Russia's fastest growing natural gas company quipped the sanctions were a badge of success.翻译:俄罗斯周五驳斥了美国因乌克兰战争而实施的新制裁，称美国永远不会击败莫斯科，而俄罗斯增长最快的天然气公司的老板则打趣称，制裁是成功的标志。

The United States on Thursday targeted Russia's future energy capabilities, sanctions evasion and a suicide drone that has been a menace to Ukrainian troops and equipment, among others, in sanctions on hundreds of people and entities.翻译:美国周四针对俄罗斯未来的能源能力、逃避制裁以及对乌克兰军队和设备等构成威胁的自杀式无人机，对数百人和实体实施了制裁。

"This is a continuation of the policy of inflicting as they call it - a strategic defeat on us," Maria Zakharova, a spokeswoman for the Russian foreign ministry, told Russian state television when asked about the new sanctions.翻译:当被问及新制裁时，俄罗斯外交部发言人玛丽亚·扎哈罗娃对俄罗斯国家电视台表示：“这是他们所说的对我们实施战略性失败政策的延续。”

"They will have to wait in vain forever before that happens."翻译:“在那件事发生之前，他们将不得不永远徒劳地等待。”

Western leaders and Ukraine have repeatedly said they seek to defeat Russia on the battlefield, though some Western leaders have denied what President Vladimir Putin says is a Western plot to carve up Russia and steal its natural resources.翻译:西方领导人和乌克兰一再表示，他们寻求在战场上击败俄罗斯，但一些西方领导人否认了弗拉基米尔·普京总统所说的西方瓜分俄罗斯并窃取其自然资源的阴谋。

Putin is girding the $2.1 trillion economy for a long war and Western hopes of stoking a swift Russian economic crisis with some of the toughest sanctions ever imposed have not been realised.翻译:普京正在为2.1万亿美元的经济做好长期战争的准备，而西方希望通过实施一些有史以来最严厉的制裁来迅速引发俄罗斯经济危机的希望尚未实现。

The International Monetary Fund forecasts Russian growth of 2.2% this year - faster than either the United States or the Euro area - though the Fund last month lowered its forecast for 2024 growth to 1.1%.翻译:国际货币基金组织预测俄罗斯今年经济增长为 2.2%，快于美国或欧元区，不过该组织上个月将 2024 年经济增长预测下调至 1.1%。

The West has frozen hundreds of billions of dollars of Russian money, but Putin has joked that the sanctions have not stopped the import of Western goods such as luxury Mercedes to Russia and that Moscow will work to undermine the sanctions by buying what it wants on global markets.翻译:西方已经冻结了数千亿美元的俄罗斯资金，但普京开玩笑说，制裁并没有阻止豪华奔驰等西方商品到俄罗斯的进口，莫斯科将通过在全球范围内购买它想要的东西来破坏制裁。市场。

The U.S., itself a large LNG producer that exports to Europe, is also trying to reduce Russia's LNG shipments to Europe, which has only banned Russian gas sent via pipeline.翻译:美国本身就是向欧洲出口液化天然气的大型生产国，它也在试图减少俄罗斯对欧洲的液化天然气运输，欧洲仅禁止俄罗斯通过管道输送天然气。

The Arctic-2 LNG project - targeted by the new sanctions - had been expecting to start exporting soon and it is uncertain how much Russian LNG will now be blocked.翻译:新制裁针对的 Arctic-2 液化天然气项目原本预计很快就会开始出口，但目前尚不确定有多少俄罗斯液化天然气将被封锁。

The largest Russian LNG producer Novatek NVTK.MM said in September it would start shipments from Arctic-2 LNG early next year.翻译:俄罗斯最大的液化天然气生产商 Novatek NVTK.MM 9 月份表示，将于明年初开始从 Arctic-2 液化天然气发货。

Leonid Mikhelson, the head of Russian natural gas producer Novatek(NVTK.MM), told a conference in the Uzbek city of Samarkand that the U.S. sanctions were a badge "of our professionalism".翻译:俄罗斯天然气生产商诺瓦泰克(NVTK.MM)负责人列昂尼德·米克尔森 (Leonid Mikhelson) 在乌兹别克斯坦撒马尔罕市举行的一次会议上表示，美国的制裁是“我们专业精神”的象征。

Reporting by Guy Faulconbridge Editing by Andrew Osborn翻译:盖伊·福尔肯布里奇 (Guy Faulconbridge) 报道 安德鲁·奥斯本 (Andrew Osborn) 编辑
item.author: Guy Faulconbridge

item.title: 着眼于中国，拜登将与拉丁领导人就经济、移民问题会面
item.description:
U.S. President Joe Biden will host leaders from Latin America and the Caribbean at the White House on Friday to discuss economic issues and migration as he seeks to bolster ties in the region to counter China and other global competitors.翻译:美国总统乔·拜登将于周五在白宫接待来自拉丁美洲和加勒比地区的领导人，讨论经济问题和移民问题，寻求加强该地区的关系以对抗中国和其他全球竞争对手。

Leaders from Barbados, Canada, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, the Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Peru and Uruguay are expected to attend Friday's gathering, as well as representatives from Mexico and Panama.翻译:来自巴巴多斯、加拿大、智利、哥伦比亚、哥斯达黎加、多米尼加共和国、厄瓜多尔、秘鲁和乌拉圭的领导人以及墨西哥和巴拿马的代表预计将出席周五的会议。

The inaugural Americas Partnership for Economic Prosperity (APEP) Leaders' Summit comes as Biden's foreign policy agenda is dominated by the Israel-Hamas conflict in Gaza and Ukraine's bid to repel Russian invaders.翻译:首届美洲经济繁荣伙伴关系（APEP）领导人峰会召开之际，拜登的外交政策议程主要是以色列与哈马斯在加沙的冲突以及乌克兰击退俄罗斯入侵者的行动。

The United States is expected to announce new development financing for countries hosting migrants in the Western Hemisphere as part of an effort to curb migrant arrivals at the U.S-Mexico border and expand economic cooperation in the region.翻译:预计美国将宣布为西半球收容移民的国家提供新的发展融资，作为遏制移民抵达美墨边境并扩大该地区经济合作的一部分。

The summit follows a similarly themed meeting of Western Hemisphere leaders in Los Angeles last year, part of a broader push aimed at strengthening regional economic ties and reducing China's influence in the region.翻译:这次峰会是继去年在洛杉矶举行的西半球领导人类似主题会议之后举行的，这是旨在加强区域经济联系并减少中国在该地区影响力的更广泛努力的一部分。

At the "Summit of the Americas" in Los Angeles last year, Biden signed a non-binding declaration where 20 countries from the region agreed to a set of measures to confront the migration crisis.翻译:去年在洛杉矶举行的“美洲峰会”上，拜登签署了一份不具约束力的声明，该地区 20 个国家同意采取一系列应对移民危机的措施。

Record numbers of migrants have crossed illegally into the U.S.-Mexico border in recent years, with hundreds of thousands of people heading north after passing through a perilous jungle region known as the Darien Gap between Colombia and Panama.翻译:近年来，非法越境进入美墨边境的移民数量创历史新高，数十万人在穿过哥伦比亚和巴拿马之间被称为达里恩峡谷的危险丛林地区后向北行进。

Reporting by Steve Holland; Editing by Christian Schmollinger翻译:史蒂夫·霍兰德报道；克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车十月份纯电动汽车销量大幅增长
item.description:
Volvo Cars' (VOLCARb.ST) sales in October grew 10% from a year earlier to 59,861 cars as fully electric car sales jumped but hybrid models fell, the Sweden-based group said on Friday.翻译:总部位于瑞典的沃尔沃汽车(VOLCARb.ST)周五表示，由于纯电动汽车销量大幅增长，但混合动力车型销量下降，该公司 10 月份销量同比增长 10%，达到 59,861 辆。

Volvo Cars said in a statement sales of fully electric cars rose 29% to account for 18% of all its cars sold in the month. Sales of hybrid cars, however, fell 8%. In total, all recharge models were up 7% to account for 36% of total sales.翻译:沃尔沃汽车在一份声明中表示，纯电动汽车销量增长了 29%，占该公司本月汽车总销量的 18%。然而，混合动力汽车的销量下降了 8%。总体而言，所有充值模式增长了 7%，占总销售额的 36%。

Shares in the group, which is majority-owned by China's Geely Holding (0175.HK), were up 6% in morning trade, taking the year-to-date drop to 12%.翻译:该集团的多数股权由中国吉利控股（0175.HK）持有，其股价在早盘交易中上涨 6%，使今年迄今的跌幅达到 12%。

CEO Jim Rowan last week said he saw healthy demand for Volvo cars and widening profit margins for its battery electric vehicles (BEV) this quarter, against the third, as the group posted third-quarter profits that lagged estimates.翻译:首席执行官吉姆·罗文(Jim Rowan) 上周表示，他看到沃尔沃汽车本季度的需求强劲，其纯电动汽车(BEV)的利润率较第三季度有所扩大，因为该集团公布的第三季度利润低于预期。

Rivals such as General Motors, Ford (F.N), Tesla (TSLA.O) and Volkswagen (VOWG_p.DE) have earlier warned that demand for EVs was not developing as expected.翻译:通用汽车、福特(FN) 、特斯拉(TSLA.O)和大众汽车(VOWG_p.DE) 等竞争对手早些时候警告称，电动汽车的需求并未按预期发展。

Volvo Cars said on Friday that sales in the biggest market Europe were up 13% in October. Sales in the U.S. were up 19% while, in China, they were flat.翻译:沃尔沃汽车周五表示，10 月份最大市场欧洲的销量增长了 13%。美国的销售额增长了 19%，而中国的销售额则持平。

Reporting by Anna Ringstrom, Editing by Terje Solsvik and Jacqueline Wong翻译:安娜·林斯特罗姆 (Anna Ringstrom) 报道，泰耶·索尔斯维克 (Terje Solsvik) 和杰奎琳·王 (Jacqueline Wong) 编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 采取五：你（可能）已经到达目的地
item.description:
Next week will have plenty to keep financial market traders and investors busy, including whether the Federal Reserve really has hit peak rates, another possible rate rise in Australia, a batch of European bank earnings and the continuing conflict in Gaza.翻译:下周将有很多事情让金融市场交易员和投资者忙碌，包括美联储是否真的达到利率峰值、澳大利亚可能再次加息、一批欧洲银行财报以及加沙持续冲突。

Here's your week-ahead primer from Marc Jones and Dhara Ranasinghe in London, Kevin Buckland in Tokyo, Tom Westbrook in Singapore and Lewis Krauskopf in New York.翻译:这是伦敦的马克·琼斯和达拉·拉纳辛格、东京的凯文·巴克兰、新加坡的汤姆·威斯布鲁克和纽约的刘易斯·克劳斯科普夫为您提供的未来一周的入门读物。

1/GRAND PLANS

Having marched interest rates all the way to the top of the hill, investors are now wondering whether the grand old dukes of the central bank world - the Fed, ECB, BoE & co - might soon be marching them down again.翻译:在将利率一路推向顶峰后，投资者现在想知道央行界的老大公们——美联储、欧洲央行、英国央行等——是否可能很快就会再次降低利率。

Take the ECB -- with euro zone inflation coming down fast and the economy heading for either stagnation or recession money markets now see rate cuts starting in April while for the BoE in Britain it is next August.翻译:以欧洲央行为例，随着欧元区通胀快速下降，经济走向停滞或衰退，货币市场现在预计从 4 月份开始降息，而英国央行则从明年8 月份开始降息。

The U.S. economy still looks impressively robust, but even there cracks are starting to show, if the sharp contraction in manufacturing data is anything to go by.翻译:美国经济看上去依然强劲，但如果制造业数据急剧收缩的话，即使存在裂缝也开始显现。

No wonder markets see a 70% chance that the Fed's brutal 20-month tightening cycle is over and that rate cuts could begin as soon as June.翻译:难怪市场认为美联储长达 20 个月的残酷紧缩周期结束的可能性有 70%，最早可能在 6 月份开始降息。

That light at the end of the tunnel has meant world stocks (.MIWD00000PUS) have just had their best week of the year so far. So watch closely to see if the top central bankers push back against the cut chatter until inflation is truly tamed.翻译:隧道尽头的曙光意味着全球股市(.MIWD00000PUS)刚刚度过了今年迄今为止最好的一周。因此，请密切关注央行高层是否会抵制降息言论，直至通胀真正得到抑制。

2/YO-YO YEN

FX traders spent months nervously watching the yen inch towards 150 per dollar only to see the Bank of Japan itself shove it well over the line this week with a decidedly tepid plan to dismantle its decade-old stimulus programme.翻译:外汇交易员花了几个月的时间紧张地注视着日元兑美元汇率逐渐逼近 150 美元，结果却发现日本央行本周将日元推向了底线，并制定了一项明显不温不火的计划来取消其长达 10 年之久的刺激计划。

The yen shot straight back up when the markets sensed the Fed might finally have reached peak rates so next week could be an interesting one.翻译:当市场意识到美联储可能最终达到峰值利率时，日元直线回升，因此下周可能是有趣的一周。

While worries about 150 as a trigger have surely been washed away, the risk of BOJ intervention remains very real because both a weak yen and the current prime minister are increasingly unpopular with the Japanese public.翻译:虽然对 150 点作为触发因素的担忧肯定已经消除，但日本央行干预的风险仍然非常现实，因为日元疲软和现任首相越来越不受日本公众的欢迎。

And as any top central banker will tell you, the time to intervene in your currency market is just after the tide has turned and the wind is on your back.翻译:正如任何一位顶级央行行长都会告诉你的那样，干预货币市场的时机就在潮流转向、顺风顺水之后。

3/CHURNING THE EARNINGS

The U.S. earnings recovery that investors had been hoping for after a lukewarm first half of the year is so far coming to pass, but a number of major tests are still to come.翻译:经历了上半年的不冷不热之后，投资者一直期盼的美国盈利复苏目前即将实现，但仍有一些重大考验即将到来。

With over 300 companies now reported, S&P 500 earnings are estimated to be up 5% year-on-year with about 80% of firms coming in with forecast-beating numbers.翻译:目前有 300 多家公司公布了盈利报告，标普 500 指数成分股的盈利预计将同比增长 5%，其中约 80% 的公司盈利超出预期。

Heavy hitters next week include eBay (EBAY.O) and D.R. Horton on Tuesday and Walt Disney (DIS.N) and Biogen (BIIB.O) on Wednesday. Later in the month, investors get to size up some of the major U.S. retailers as well as the big winner of this year's AI frenzy, Nvidia (NVDA.O).翻译:下周的重磅人物包括周二的 eBay (EBAY.O)和 DR Horton，以及周三的华特迪士尼(DIS.N)和 Biogen (BIIB.O) 。本月晚些时候，投资者将开始评估美国一些主要零售商以及今年人工智能热潮的大赢家英伟达(NVDA.O) 。

In Europe it's all about the money and the metal, with UBS on Tuesday, Commerzbank and ABN Amro on Wednesday, steel giant Arcelor Mittal on Thursday and insurance heavyweight Allianz on Friday.翻译:在欧洲，一切都与金钱和金属有关，周二是瑞银，周三是德国商业银行和荷兰银行，周四是钢铁巨头安赛乐米塔尔，周五是保险巨头安联。

4/ONE MONTH IN

Next week marks a month since the deadly attack by Hamas in Israel triggered the worst escalation of the long-running Middle East conflict in decades.翻译:下周是哈马斯在以色列发动的致命袭击引发数十年来最严重的中东冲突升级一个月。

Israeli forces have pushed into Gaza City in the north of the Gaza Strip, but are facing resistance from militant hit-and-run attacks from underground tunnels. Gaza health authorities say the Palestinian death toll now exceeds 9,000.翻译:以色列军队已挺进加沙地带北部的加沙城，但面临来自地下隧道的武装分子打了就跑的袭击的抵抗。加沙卫生当局表示，巴勒斯坦死亡人数目前已超过 9,000 人。

For those in the financial markets watching nervously it is a crucial moment. Safe-haven gold has surged almost 10% since the troubles ignited but the initial spike in oil prices, triggered by fears Iran could be drawn into the crisis, has fully subsided and even Israel's shekel has started to bounce.翻译:对于那些在金融市场紧张关注的人来说，这是一个关键时刻。自危机爆发以来，避险黄金已飙升近 10%，但因担心伊朗可能陷入危机而引发的油价最初飙升已完全平息，甚至以色列谢克尔也开始反弹。

The situation could quickly spiral again, though. An increasing number of countries are calling for a pause in hostilities, Hezbollah is agitating, while U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken is visiting Israel, Jordan and other countries in the region in the coming days for a new round of diplomatic talks.翻译:不过，情况可能很快会再次恶化。越来越多的国家呼吁停止敌对行动， 真主党也在煽动，而美国国务卿布林肯将在未来几天访问以色列、约旦和该地区其他国家，进行新一轮外交会谈。

5/RACE DAY RATE HIKE

The famous Melbourne Cup horse race runs on Tuesday, but some of the shortest odds are on an Aussie central bank rate hike over in Sydney that day. Following a hotter-than-expected third-quarter inflation print, where the RBA's preferred measure of core inflation rose to 1.2%, markets price a near 60% chance of a quarter point hike.翻译:著名的墨尔本杯赛马比赛将于周二举行，但其中一些赔率最小的是澳大利亚央行当天在悉尼加息。第三季度通胀数据超出预期，澳大利亚央行首选的核心通胀指标升至 1.2%，市场预计加息 25 个基点的可能性接近 60%。

All of the "Big Four" Australian banks forecast a hike, too, including Westpac where newly-installed chief economist Luci Ellis was until recently assistant governor at the RBA.翻译:澳大利亚所有“四大”银行也都预测加息，其中包括西太平洋银行，该银行新上任的首席经济学家卢西·埃利斯(Luci Ellis)直到最近才担任澳大利亚央行助理行长。

Indeed futures imply a real risk that the 4.1% cash rate could be raised twice to 4.60% and kept there for all of 2024.翻译:事实上，期货意味着 4.1% 的现金利率可能会两次上调至 4.60%，并在 2024 年全年保持这一水平，这是一个真正的风险。

Three-year and 10-year Australian government bond yields have hit their highest since 2011, though backed off slightly on the Fed's hold. The Australian dollar has also rallied strongly against its New Zealand counterpart as rate expectations diverge.翻译:三年期和十年期澳大利亚政府债券收益率已触及 2011 年以来的最高水平，但因美联储维持利率不变而略有回落。由于利率预期出现分歧，澳元兑新西兰元也强劲上涨。

Complied by Marc Jones; graphics by Kripa Jayaram, Riddhima Talwani and Prinz Magtulis Editing by Gareth Jones翻译:马克·琼斯 (Marc Jones) 整理；制图：Kripa Jayaram、Riddhima Talwani 和 Prinz Magtulis 编辑：Gareth Jones
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 诺瓦泰克负责人表示美国制裁是我们专业精神的标志
item.description:
Leonid Mikhelson, the head of Russian natural gas producer Novatek (NVTK.MM), said on Friday that U.S. sanctions against its future liquefied natural gas project Arctic LNG 2 were an "estimate of our professionalism".翻译:俄罗斯天然气生产商诺瓦泰克(NVTK.MM)负责人列昂尼德·米克尔森 (Leonid Mikhelson) 周五表示，美国对其未来液化天然气项目 Arctic LNG 2 的制裁是“对我们专业精神的评估”。

Speaking at a conference in Samarkand, he also said that Qatar, Russia and the United States will be able to meet future global LNG demand.翻译:他在撒马尔罕的一次会议上发表讲话时还表示，卡塔尔、俄罗斯和美国将能够满足未来全球液化天然气需求。

The United States on Thursday imposed sweeping new measures against Moscow over the conflict in Ukraine, targeting Russia's future energy capabilities among other aims.翻译:美国周四就乌克兰冲突对莫斯科实施了全面的新措施，其目标之一是俄罗斯未来的能源能力。

Arctic LNG-2 is led by Russian Novatek (NVTK.MM) which holds a 60% stake. Other shareholders include French energy major TotalEnergies (TTEF.PA), China's CNPC and CNOOC Ltd (0883.HK) as well as Japan Arctic LNG - a consortium of Mitsui & Co, Ltd. (8031.T) and JOGMEC - each holding 10% stake.翻译:Arctic LNG-2由俄罗斯诺瓦泰克（NVTK.MM）主导，持有60%的股份。其他股东包括法国能源巨头 TotalEnergies (TTEF.PA) 、中国石油天然气集团公司和中海油有限公司(0883.HK)以及日本 Arctic LNG（由三井物产株式会社 (Mitsui & Co., Ltd.) (8031.T)和 JOGMEC 组成的财团），各持有 10 股% 股权。

The project is expected to start producing the super-cooled gas at the end of this year or in early 2024 at its first technological line.翻译:该项目预计将于今年年底或 2024 年初在其第一条技术生产线上开始生产过冷天然气。

Arctic LNG 2 would be Russia's third large-scale project for producing LNG after a Gazprom (GAZP.MM)-led Sakhalin 2 plant in Russia's Pacific and Yamal LNG controlled by Novatek. It would help Russia achieve its goal of gaining 20% of the global LNG market by 2035 from around 8% currently.翻译:北极液化天然气2号项目将是继俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（GAZP.MM）领导的俄罗斯太平洋萨哈林2号工厂和诺瓦泰克控制的亚马尔液化天然气工厂之后，俄罗斯第三个生产液化天然气的大型项目。它将帮助俄罗斯实现到 2035 年将全球液化天然气市场份额从目前约 8% 左右增加到 20% 的目标。

Arctic LNG 2's three lines will have production capacity of 6.6 million tonnes of LNG per year each. Investments in the project are estimated at $21.3 billion.翻译:Arctic LNG 2 的 3 条生产线将分别年产 660 万吨液化天然气。该项目的投资估计为213亿美元。

Reporting by Olesya Astakhova; writing by Vladimir Soldatkin; editing by Guy Faulconbridge翻译:奥莱斯娅·阿斯塔科娃 (Olesya Astakhova) 报道；弗拉基米尔·索尔达金 (Vladimir Soldatkin) 撰写；盖伊·福尔肯布里奇编辑
item.author: Olesya Astakhova

item.title: 香港学生因在日本社交媒体发布煽动罪被判入狱两个月
item.description:
A Hong Kong court on Friday sentenced a student to two months imprisonment for sedition over pro-independence social media posts she published while studying in Japan.翻译:周五，香港一家法院以煽动叛乱罪判处一名学生两个月监禁，原因是她在日本求学期间在社交媒体上发表了支持独立的帖子。

This is the first known Hong Konger convicted under the colonial-era sedition law over online speech in Japan.翻译:这是第一位因在日本网上言论而根据殖民时代煽动法被定罪的已知香港人。

Scholars and overseas activists say this case represents an alarming escalation of the chilling effect experienced by those who continue to engage with Hong Kong affairs.翻译:学者和海外活动人士表示，这起案件代表了那些继续参与香港事务的人所经历的寒蝉效应的惊人升级。

Chief Magistrate Victor So sentenced the student to 2 months jail after her guilty plea, saying deterrent sentencing was needed because "ingorant people would be incited subtly".翻译:总裁判官苏国经在该学生认罪后判处她两个月监禁，并表示需要威慑性的量刑，因为“无知的人会被巧妙地煽动”。

Mika Yuen, 23, pleaded guilty to sedition in late October, for 13 pro-Hong Kong independence social media posts on Facebook and Instagram published between September 2018 and March 2023.翻译:23 岁的袁美嘉 (Mika Yuen) 于 10 月底承认犯有煽动叛乱罪，罪名是她于 2018 年 9 月至 2023 年 3 月期间在 Facebook 和 Instagram 上发布了 13 条支持香港独立的社交媒体帖子。

According to the prosecutor, most of the posts were published when she was studying in Japan, with messages like "I am a Hongkonger; I advocate for Hong Kong independence," and "Hong Kong independence, the only way out".翻译:检察官称，大部分帖子是她在日本留学时发表的，内容包括“我是香港人，我主张港独”、“港独是唯一出路”等。

Among the 13 alleged social media posts, only two posts were published in Hong Kong.翻译:在这 13 条涉嫌社交媒体的帖子中，只有 2 条是在香港发布的。

She was arrested in March after returning to the city to renew her identity card.翻译:她于3月份回城更新身份证后被捕。

The defense had earlier disputed whether the magistrate's court had extraterritorial jurisdiction over the posts she published aboard, but they abandoned the dispute as she didn't remove the content.翻译:辩方早些时候曾质疑地方法院是否对她在船上发布的帖子拥有域外管辖权，但由于她没有删除这些内容，他们放弃了争议。

During mitigation, defence lawyer Steven Kwan argued that the number of friends and followers on the Yuen's social media account was relatively small.翻译:在减刑期间，辩护律师史蒂文·关（Steven Kwan）辩称，袁的社交媒体账户上的朋友和关注者数量相对较少。

Kwan said Yuen has become more open-minded after studying politics at a law school in Japan and that the chance of re-offending is low.翻译:关说，袁在日本法学院学习政治后，思想变得更加开放，再次犯罪的可能性很低。

Sedition is punishable by a maximum jail term of two years upon conviction. It is not among the offences criminalised by the Beijing imposed national security law, but it has been ruled by the Court of Final Appeal as an act that can endanger national security.翻译:煽动罪一经定罪，最高可判处两年监禁。它不属于北京实施的国家安全法定罪的犯罪行为，但已被终审法院裁定为可能危害国家安全的行为。

Tomoko Ako, a sociology and China studies professor at the University of Tokyo told Reuters that the Japanese government, universtiites and society need to take this case seriously.翻译:东京大学社会学和中国研究教授赤子智子告诉路透社，日本政府、大学和社会需要认真对待这一案件。

"I am concerned about the situation in Japan. This is because the freedoms that we have taken for granted are being slowly and steadily taken away, yet very few people see this as a serious problem," Ako said.翻译:“我对日本的局势感到担忧。这是因为我们视为理所当然的自由正在被缓慢而稳定地剥夺，但很少有人认为这是一个严重的问题，”阿科说。

Athena Tong, a board member of the Japan Hong Kong Democracy Alliance told Reuters that this case "exemplifies the extent to which the government represses freedom of speech on a global scale".翻译:日本香港民主联盟董事会成员汤雅典娜对路透社表示，此案“体现了政府在全球范围内压制言论自由的程度”。

"It has significantly influenced how members of the Hong Kong diaspora perceive the safety of traveling to Hong Kong for personal matters," Tong said, adding that a return to the city might entail political prosecution.翻译:唐说：“这极大地影响了香港侨民对因个人事务前往香港的安全性的看法。”他补充说，返回香港可能会面临政治起诉。

Reporting by Jessie Pang; Editing by James Pomfret; Editing by Michael Perry翻译:彭洁西报道；詹姆斯·庞弗雷特编辑；迈克尔·佩里编辑
item.author: Jessie Pang

item.title: 澳大利亚和中国：恢复贸易和访问的道路崎岖
item.description:
Prime Minister Anthony Albanese will on Saturday become the first Australian leader to visit China in seven years, arriving after a period of badly strained relations with the aim of improving dialogue and stabilising ties.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·艾博内塞将于周六成为七年来第一位访问中国的澳大利亚领导人，他在经历了一段严重紧张的关系之后抵达中国，目的是改善对话和稳定关系。

But difficult issues remain between the major trading partners and Albanese said he would raise concerns over rising tension in the South China Sea in a meeting with President Xi Jinping in Beijing on Monday.翻译:但主要贸易伙伴之间仍存在棘手问题，阿尔巴尼斯表示，他将在周一与国家主席习近平在北京会晤时提出对南海紧张局势升级的担忧。

Following is a timeline of relations between Australia and China over recent years.翻译:以下是近年来澳大利亚与中国关系的时间表。

Nov. 17, 2014 - Australia sealed a landmark free trade agreement with top trade partner China, concluding a decade of negotiations. It comes into effect in late 2015.翻译:2014年11月17日——澳大利亚与最大贸易伙伴中国签署了具有里程碑意义的自由贸易协定，结束了长达十年的谈判。该法案将于 2015 年底生效。

Dec. 5, 2017 - Australia, concerned about Chinese influence, announces ban on foreign political donations to prevent external interference in its politics.翻译:2017年12月5日——担心中国影响力的澳大利亚宣布禁止外国政治捐款，以防止外部干涉其政治。

Aug. 23, 2018 - Australia bans Huawei Technologies Co Ltd from supplying equipment for its planned 5G broadband network, citing national security regulations.翻译:2018 年 8 月 23 日 - 澳大利亚以国家安全法规为由，禁止华为技术有限公司为其计划中的 5G 宽带网络提供设备。

April 2020 - Australia seeks support for an international inquiry into the origins of the COVID-19 pandemic. China's then ambassador to Australia says that in response to the call, the Chinese public would boycott Australian wine, beef and tourism.翻译:2020 年 4 月 - 澳大利亚寻求支持对 COVID-19 大流行的起源进行国际调查。时任中国驻澳大利亚大使表示，响应号召，中国公众将抵制澳大利亚葡萄酒、牛肉和旅游业。

June 9, 2020 - China urges students going overseas to think carefully before choosing Australia, citing racist incidents, threatening a $27.5 billion market for educating foreign students.翻译:2020年6月9日 - 中国以种族主义事件为由，敦促出国留学的学生在选择澳大利亚之前慎重考虑，威胁到275亿美元的外国学生教育市场。

August 2020 - Australian citizen Cheng Lei, a business anchor for Chinese state television in Beijing, is detained.翻译:2020 年 8 月 - 澳大利亚公民成雷，北京中国国家电视台商业主播被拘留。

Nov. 27, 2020 - China will impose temporary anti-dumping tariffs on Australian wine, China announces. Shipments of Australian live lobsters, timber and barley are also blocked or restricted around this time. China's embassy lists 14 grievances with Australia, including the blocking of 10 Chinese investments on national security grounds.翻译:2020年11月27日——中国宣布对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收临时反倾销关税。澳大利亚活龙虾、木材和大麦的运输也在此时被封锁或限制。中国大使馆列出了对澳大利亚的14项不满，其中包括以国家安全为由阻止10项中国投资。

December 2020 - Australia raises concern at WTO meeting about China's measures to restrict or ban shipments of Australian barley, wine, meat, dairy, live seafood, logs, timber, coal and cotton.翻译:2020 年 12 月 - 澳大利亚在世贸组织会议上对中国限制或禁止运输澳大利亚大麦、葡萄酒、肉类、乳制品、活海鲜、原木、木材、煤炭和棉花的措施表示担忧。

May 22, 2022 - Australia's Labor Party, led by Albanese, ends almost a decade of conservative rule with a general election victory.翻译:2022 年 5 月 22 日 - 阿尔巴内塞领导的澳大利亚工党以大选胜利结束了近十年的保守派统治。

Nov. 15, 2022 - Albanese meets President Xi Jinping on sidelines of G20 in Indonesia, first leaders' meeting since 2016.翻译:2022 年 11 月 15 日 - 阿尔巴内塞在印度尼西亚举行的 G20 峰会期间会见了习近平主席，这是自 2016 年以来的首次领导人会议。

Dec. 21, 2022 - Foreign Minister Penny Wong in Beijing for first formal talks in China since 2018.翻译:2022 年 12 月 21 日 - 外交部长黄英贤在北京举行自 2018 年以来首次在华正式会谈。

Jan. 3, 2023 - China allows three government-backed utilities and its top steelmaker to resume coal imports from Australia.翻译:2023 年 1 月 3 日 - 中国允许三个政府支持的公用事业公司及其最大的钢铁制造商恢复从澳大利亚进口煤炭。

May 11 - Australia's Trade Minister Don Farrell arrives in Beijing for talks on removal of trade barriers.翻译:5月11日，澳大利亚贸易部长唐·法雷尔抵达北京就消除贸易壁垒进行会谈。

Aug. 5 - China ends 80.5% tariffs on Australian barley.翻译:8 月 5 日——中国终止对澳大利亚大麦征收 80.5% 的关税。

Sept. 7 - Albanese meets Premier Li Qiang on sidelines of East Asia Summit in Indonesia.翻译:9月7日——阿尔巴内斯在印度尼西亚东亚峰会期间会见了李强总理。

Oct. 11 - China releases Australian journalist Cheng Lei after three years in a Beijing prison on national security charges.翻译:10 月 11 日 - 中国释放了因国家安全罪名被关押在北京监狱三年的澳大利亚记者成雷。

Oct. 21 - Australia gives green light to Chinese company Landbridge's 99-year lease on Port of Darwin after security review.翻译:10月21日——经过安全审查，澳大利亚批准中国公司岚桥集团在达尔文港的99年租约。

Oct. 22 - China agrees to review dumping tariffs of 218% on Australian wine, potentially clearing way for the resumption of imports. Australia pauses WTO complaint.翻译:10 月 22 日——中国同意对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收 218% 的倾销关税进行复审，这可能为恢复进口扫清道路。澳大利亚暂停向世贸组织申诉。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:科斯蒂·李约瑟报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于中东忧虑缓解、中国需求不确定，油价将每周下跌
item.description:
Oil prices were little changed on Friday, but headed for a second week of losses as supply concerns driven by conflict in the Middle East eased, while the demand outlook from the world's top crude importer China remained uncertain.翻译:周五油价变化不大，但由于中东冲突引发的供应担忧有所缓解，而全球最大原油进口国中国的需求前景仍不确定，油价将连续第二周下跌。

Brent crude futures rose 34 cents, or 0.4%, to $87.19 a barrel at 0735 GMT, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude futures gained 41 cents, or 0.5%, to $82.87 a barrel.翻译:截至格林威治标准时间 0735，布伦特原油期货上涨 34 美分，即 0.4%，至每桶 87.19 美元，而美国西德克萨斯中质原油期货上涨 41 美分，即 0.5%，至每桶 82.87 美元。

"Oil prices have managed to ride on the improved risk environment higher, as markets continue to bask in the hopes that the Fed is likely done with its rate hiking process," said Yeap Jun Rong, market strategist at IG.翻译:IG市场策略师Yeap Jun Rong表示，“随着市场继续沉浸在美联储可能完成加息进程的希望之中，油价成功地在风险环境改善的情况下走高。”

"Nevertheless, there are still some reservations around oil demand outlook this week as China's PMI did not provide much conviction of a demand revival in place," Yeap added.翻译:Yeap补充道：“尽管如此，本周对石油需求前景仍持一些保留态度，因为中国的PMI并未对需求复苏给出太多信心。”

China's manufacturing activity unexpectedly contracted in October. The official purchasing managers' index (PMI) fell to 49.5 in October from 50.2, dipping back below the 50-point level demarcating contraction from expansion, data from the National Bureau of Statistics showed on Wednesday.翻译:中国十月份制造业活动意外收缩。国家统计局周三公布的数据显示，10 月份官方采购经理人指数(PMI) 从 50.2 降至 49.5，跌破 50 点的收缩与扩张界限。

On Friday, a private sector survey showed China's services activity expanded at a slightly faster pace in October, but sales grew at the softest rate in 10 months and employment stagnated as business confidence waned.翻译:周五，一项私营部门调查显示，10月份中国服务业活动扩张速度略快，但销售增速为10个月来最低，且随着商业信心减弱，就业停滞。

Meanwhile, geopolitical concerns remained in focus, as Israeli forces on Thursday encircled Gaza City - the Gaza Strip's main city - in their assault on Hamas, its military said, but the Palestinian militant group resisted their drive with hit-and-run attacks from underground tunnels.翻译:与此同时，地缘政治担忧仍然成为焦点，以色列军方表示，周四，以色列军队包围了加沙地带的主要城市加沙城，袭击哈马斯，但巴勒斯坦激进组织从地下发动打了就跑的袭击，抵制了他们的进攻。隧道。

The White House said it was exploring a series of pauses in the Israel-Hamas conflict to help people safely exit Gaza and allow humanitarian aid to get in.翻译:白宫表示，正在探索暂停以色列与哈马斯冲突的一系列措施，以帮助人们安全撤离加沙，并允许人道主义援助进入。

Both benchmarks gained more than $2 a barrel on Thursday, though Brent was on track to post weekly losses of about 4% as of Friday, while WTI looked set to close lower by 3% from last week.翻译:周四，这两个基准价格均上涨逾 2 美元/桶，但截至周五，布伦特原油周跌幅约为 4%，而 WTI 收盘价较上周下跌 3%。

The U.S. Federal Reserve held interest rates steady on Wednesday, while the Bank of England held interest rates at a 15-year peak. The stable rates kept oil prices supported as some risk appetite returned to markets.翻译:美联储周三维持利率不变，英国央行则将利率维持在15年来的最高水平。随着部分风险偏好回归市场，稳定的利率为油价提供了支撑。

On the supply side, top oil exporter Saudi Arabia is expected to reconfirm an extension of its voluntary oil-output cut of 1 million barrels per day through December, based on analyst expectations.翻译:在供应方面，根据分析师的预期，最大石油出口国沙特阿拉伯预计将再次确认将自愿减产 100 万桶/日的期限延长至 12 月。

Meanwhile, U.S. oil rig count data is expected later in the day and will serve as an indicator of future production.翻译:与此同时，预计当天晚些时候将公布美国石油钻井平台数量数据，该数据将作为未来产量的指标。

Reporting by Jeslyn Lerh; Additional reporting by Arathy Somasekhar in Houston; Editing by Christian Schmollinger and Jacqueline Wong翻译:Jeslyn Lerh 报道； Arathy Somasekhar 在休斯顿的补充报道；克里斯蒂安·施莫林格和杰奎琳·黄编辑
item.author: Jeslyn Lerh

item.title: 德国9月出口降幅超预期
item.description:
German exports fell more than expected on the month in September, federal statistics office data showed on Friday, as weak global demand hurt exports.翻译:联邦统计局周五公布的数据显示，由于全球需求疲软损害了出口，德国 9 月份出口降幅超出预期。

German exports fell 2.4% in September from the previous month. The result compared with a forecast 1.1% decline in a LSEG poll.翻译:德国9月份出口环比下降2.4%。与 LSEG 民意调查预测的下降 1.1% 相比。

"Trade is no longer the strong resilient growth driver of the German economy that it used to be, but rather a drag," said Carsten Brzeski, global head of macro at ING.翻译:荷兰国际集团(ING)全球宏观主管卡斯滕·布热斯基(Carsten Brzeski)表示：“贸易不再像过去那样成为德国经济强劲的弹性增长动力，而是一种拖累。”

He said that since the start of 2022, net exports have been a drag on the economy in four out of six quarters.翻译:他表示，自2022年年初以来，净出口在六个季度中有四个季度拖累了经济。

Supply chain frictions, a more fragmented global economy and China moving from a dynamic export destination to competitor are all factors weighing on the German export sector, Brzeski said.翻译:布热斯基表示，供应链摩擦、全球经济更加分散，以及中国从充满活力的出口目的地转变为竞争对手，这些因素都给德国出口行业带来压力。

Exports to European Union countries fell 2.1% on the month and exports to countries outside the EU fell 2.8%, with sharp declines in exports to the U.S. and China.翻译:本月对欧盟国家的出口下降2.1%，对欧盟以外国家的出口下降2.8%，其中对美国和中国的出口大幅下降。

The statistics office upwardly revised the data of the previous month to a 0.1% increase in exports on the month, instead of a 1.2% decline.翻译:统计局将上月数据上修为当月出口增长0.1%，而不是下降1.2%。

Imports also unexpectedly fell by 1.7% on the month in September, the data showed. They had been forecast to increase by 0.5%.翻译:数据显示，9月份进口也意外下降1.7%。此前预计增长 0.5%。

The foreign trade balance showed a surplus of 16.5 billion euros ($17.54 billion) in September, versus an upwardly revised surplus of 17.7 billion euros the previous month.翻译:9月份外贸余额显示顺差165亿欧元（合175.4亿美元），而上个月向上修正的顺差为177亿欧元。

Reporting by Maria Martinez, writing by Miranda Murray, editing by Kirsti Knolle and Jason Neely翻译:玛丽亚·马丁内斯报道，米兰达·穆雷撰稿，克斯蒂·诺尔和杰森·尼利编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日本首相岸田抵达菲律宾进行正式访问
item.description:
Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida arrived in the Philippines on Friday for a two-day official visit aimed at boosting defence and security ties at a time of heightened tension in Philippines-China relations.翻译:日本首相岸田文雄周五抵达菲律宾进行为期两天的正式访问，旨在在菲中关系紧张之际加强防务和安全关系。

Kishida will meet President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. at the presidential palace to discuss a range of issues, including the South China Sea, where Manila and Beijing have had several confrontations.翻译:岸田将在总统府会见小费迪南德·马科斯总统，讨论一系列问题，包括南海问题，马尼拉和北京在南海问题上发生了几次对抗。

"Among the specific issues to be discussed are the West Philippine Sea, trade and investment, and Japan's Official Development Assistance (ODA)," Marcos' office said ahead of Kishida's visit.翻译:马科斯办公室在岸田访问前表示，“将讨论的具体问题包括西菲律宾海、贸易和投资以及日本官方发展援助（ODA）”。

"They will also exchange views on major regional, international, and United Nations issues affecting the region and the world."翻译:“他们还将就影响地区和世界的重大地区、国际和联合国问题交换意见。”

Japan does not have any claim to the waters, but has a separate maritime dispute with China in the East China Sea.翻译:日本对该海域没有任何主权声索，但与中国在东海存在单独的海洋争端。

China claims almost all of the South China Sea and its growing military presence there has fuelled concern in Japan and the West, with the United States holding regular air and naval patrols to ensure freedom of navigation.翻译:中国声称拥有几乎整个南海及其日益增长的军事存在，这引发了日本和西方国家的担忧，美国定期进行空中和海上巡逻以确保航行自由。

Ahead of the visit, the Japan defence ministry announced the delivery of the first air surveillance radar system to the Philippine military as part of a 2020 contract between the Philippines' defence department and Mitsubishi Electric Corp.翻译:在访问之前，日本防卫省宣布向菲律宾军方交付首个空中监视雷达系统，作为菲律宾国防部与三菱电机公司之间 2020 年合同的一部分。

In February, Marcos and Kishida agreed in Tokyo that their militaries would cooperate in disaster relief, an agreement seen as a step towards a broader pact that could allow the countries to deploy forces on each other's soil.翻译:今年二月，马科斯和岸田在东京同意两国军队将在救灾方面进行合作，这一协议被视为迈向更广泛协议的一步，该协议可以允许两国在彼此的领土上部署部队。

Following that meeting, Marcos said he saw no reason why the Philippines should not have a troop pact with Japan if it would boost maritime security.翻译:会后，马科斯表示，如果能加强海上安全，他认为菲律宾没有理由不与日本签订驻军协议。

On Saturday, Kishida will speak before the Philippine Congress.翻译:周六，岸田将在菲律宾国会发表讲话。

Reporting by Karen Lema; Editing by Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:凯伦·莱玛报道；编辑：拉朱·戈帕拉克里希南
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国将迎来极端天气年由暖转冷
item.description:
Temperatures in northern China are set to plunge as much as 20 degrees Celsius after the second-warmest October in decades, but warmer-than-usual conditions could soon be back under the influence of El Nino.翻译:在经历了几十年来第二热的10月之后，中国北方的气温预计将骤降20摄氏度，但在厄尔尼诺现象的影响下，气温可能很快就会恢复到高于正常水平的水平。

A stream of cold air entering China on Saturday from the northwest will join one that arrived on Thursday to push temperatures sharply lower, the China Meteorological Administration (CMA) said.翻译:中国气象局表示，周六从西北进入中国的一股冷空气将与周四抵达的一股冷空气汇合，导致气温大幅下降。

In the sparsely populated deserts and grasslands of the northern Inner Mongolia region, temperatures could plummet on Friday and again from Saturday while blizzards could hit the Xinjiang region in the northwest.翻译:内蒙古北部地区人口稀少的沙漠和草原，周五和周六起气温可能会骤降，而西北地区的新疆地区可能会出现暴风雪。

From next week, most of the northeast is expected to see maximum temperatures dive to the single-digits or below freezing as cold air moves east and south, in an abrupt reversal of a recent "big warming", the CMA said.翻译:CMA表示，从下周开始，随着冷空气向东和向南移动，东北部大部分地区的最高气温预计将降至个位数或冰点以下，这是最近“大变暖”的突然逆转。

While freezing temperatures are not uncommon for the time of year, the sudden change is unusual.翻译:虽然一年中的某个时候，气温结冰并不罕见，但突然的变化却是不寻常的。

A few days ago, uncharacteristically warm weather saw parts of northern China post record high temperatures exceeding 30C.翻译:日前，我国北方部分地区出现反常高温，气温超过30℃。

Weather has become more extreme in China in recent years, destroying urban infrastructure as well as farmland, causing hefty economic losses and raising fears about the pace and impact of global warming.翻译:近年来，中国的天气变得更加极端，破坏了城市基础设施和农田，造成了巨大的经济损失，并引发了人们对全球变暖速度和影响的担忧。

This summer, typhoons dumped historic rainfall in inland regions unaccustomed to tropical storms. Typhoon Doksuri caused the worst flooding since 1963 in the Hai river basin that encompasses Beijing, Tianjin and Hebei province.翻译:今年夏天，台风给不习惯热带风暴的内陆地区带来了历史性的降雨。台风“多克苏里”给京津冀海河流域带来了自1963年以来最严重的洪水。

Authorities are due to issue 1 trillion yuan ($137 billion) of sovereign bonds to help rebuild areas hit by the floods and improve infrastructure to cope with disasters.翻译:当局将发行1万亿元人民币（1,370亿美元）的主权债券，以帮助重建遭受洪水袭击的地区并改善基础设施以应对灾害。

Earlier in the year, northern China basked in unseasonal heat, with temperatures reaching summer-levels, shortly after a very cold January, when the northernmost city of Mohe saw the temperature dip to a record minus 53C.翻译:今年早些时候，中国北方迎来了反季节的高温，在经历了非常寒冷的一月份后不久，最北端城市漠河的气温降至创纪录的零下53摄氏度，气温达到了夏季水平。

Winter this year, however, could be warmer due to a moderate El Nino, Jia Xiaolong, deputy director of China's National Climate Centre, told a press conference on Friday.翻译:然而，中国国家气候中心副主任贾小龙在周五的新闻发布会上表示，由于温和的厄尔尼诺现象，今年的冬季可能会变暖。

El Nino is a natural climate pattern associated with warming of the ocean surface temperatures in the central and eastern Pacific. The phenomenon occurs every two to seven years, lasting nine to 12 months.翻译:厄尔尼诺现象是一种与太平洋中部和东部海洋表面温度变暖有关的自然气候模式。这种现象每两到七年就会发生一次，持续九到十二个月。

"The sea surface temperature in the east-central equatorial Pacific will continue to exceed 0.5C in November, and the El Nino event will persist in the 2023/2024 winter, with a peak intensity of 1.5-2C," Jia said.翻译:“11月赤道中东部太平洋海温将继续超过0.5℃，厄尔尼诺事件将持续到2023/2024年冬季，峰值强度为1.5-2℃。”贾说。

But statistics showed that winter temperatures could fluctuate greatly during El Nino, Jia warned.翻译:但贾警告说，统计数据显示，厄尔尼诺现象期间冬季气温可能会出现大幅波动。

($1 = 7.3127 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.3127 人民币）

(This story has been refiled to drop reference to Fahrenheit scale in paragraph 1)翻译:（这个故事已被重新提交，以删除第 1 段中对华氏温标的引用）

Reporting by Ethan Wang and Ryan Woo; Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔 编辑, Robert Birsel
item.author: Ethan Wang, Ryan Woo

item.title: 随着与华盛顿的紧张关系缓和，中国对美国芯片制造商美光科技态度热情
item.description:
China's commerce minister told Micron Technology Inc's (MU.O) president Beijing would welcome the U.S. semiconductor company deepening its footprint in the Chinese market, signally a further thaw in relations between the world's top two economies.翻译:中国商务部长告诉美光科技公司(MU.O)总裁，北京欢迎这家美国半导体公司加深在中国市场的足迹，这标志着世界两大经济体之间关系的进一步解冻。

In a meeting on Nov. 1, Commerce Minister Wang Wentao told Sanjay Mehrotra, President and CEO of Micron Technology, that China will optimize the environment for foreign investment and provide service guarantees for foreign enterprises, according to a brief statement published on Friday on the commerce ministry's website.翻译:据商务部周五发布的一份简短声明称，商务部部长王文涛在 11 月 1 日的会议上向美光科技总裁兼首席执行官 Sanjay Mehrotra 表示，中国将优化外商投资环境，为外国企业提供服务保障。商务部网站。

"We welcome Micron Technology to continue to take root in the Chinese market and achieve better development under the premise of complying with Chinese laws and regulations," Wang added.翻译:“我们欢迎美光科技继续扎根中国市场，在遵守中国法律法规的前提下取得更好的发展。”王补充道。

The detente comes just months after China's cyberspace regulator said Micron had failed a network security review and barred Chinese operators of key infrastructure from buying from the largest U.S. memory chipmaker.翻译:就在几个月前，中国网络空间监管机构表示美光科技未能通过网络安全审查，并禁止中国关键基础设施运营商从这家美国最大的存储芯片制造商购买产品。

China's move against Micron was widely seen as retaliation for Washington's efforts to restrict Beijing's access to key technology. It came just a day after the Group of Seven (G7) rich nations agreed they would look to "de-risk, not decouple" from China, and as Washington pressured its allies to join it in restricting chip equipment exports to China.翻译:人们普遍认为，中国针对美光科技的举动是对华盛顿限制北京获取关键技术的报复。就在一天前，七国集团（G7）富裕国家同意寻求与中国“降低风险，而不是脱钩”，而华盛顿则向其盟友施压，要求其加入限制向中国出口芯片设备的行列。

The Wednesday meeting between Wang and Mehrotra is line with a recent thawing in tensions between Washington and Beijing, as officials from both countries work to organise a meeting between U.S. President Joe Biden and his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping later this month at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit in San Francisco.翻译:王毅和梅赫罗特拉周三的会面正值华盛顿和北京之间最近紧张局势缓和之际，两国官员正在努力组织美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平本月晚些时候在亚太经合组织举行的会晤。旧金山合作峰会。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Editing by Sonali Paul and Lincoln Feast翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；索纳利·保罗和林肯·费斯特编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着关系改善，中国葡萄酒市场准备迎接澳大利亚葡萄酒可能回归
item.description:
Summary:
  • Australian Prime Minister Albanese begins visit to China on Saturday翻译:澳大利亚总理阿尔巴内塞周六开始访华
  • First visit by an Australian prime minister since 2016翻译:澳大利亚总理自2016年以来首次访华
  • China put 218% tax on Australian wine in 2021 as ties worsened翻译:随着关系恶化，中国将于2021年对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收218%的税
  • Both sides have agreed to review tariffs, including for wine翻译:双方同意审查关税，包括葡萄酒关税
  • Australian wine could return to the China market early next year if punitive tariffs removed翻译:如果取消惩罚性关税，澳大利亚葡萄酒可能于明年初重返中国市场

News that punitive tariffs on Australian wine introduced by China in 2021 would be reviewed as part of a push to improve the relationship between the two countries was cheered by many, including Campbell Thompson.翻译:作为推动改善两国关系的一部分，中国将于 2021 年对澳大利亚葡萄酒征收惩罚性关税的消息受到了包括坎贝尔·汤普森 (Campbell Thompson) 在内的许多人的欢呼。

The Beijing-based Australian CEO of wine importer and distributor The Wine Republic has spent more than a decade making his living from bringing wine, much of it from Australia, into the China market.翻译:葡萄酒进口商和经销商 The Wine Republic 驻北京的澳大利亚首席执行官十多年来一直靠将葡萄酒（其中大部分来自澳大利亚）引入中国市场为生。

"We are looking forward to the tariffs being removed. I think for Australia there is definitely an opportunity," he said.翻译:“我们期待取消关税。我认为对澳大利亚来说绝对有机会，”他说。

Late last month, as ties between Beijing and Canberra improved, the two sides announced they had reached a consensus to settle a World Trade Organisation dispute about wine and that anti-dumping tariffs, which weren't set to expire until 2026, would be reviewed.翻译:上个月末，随着北京和堪培拉之间关系的改善，双方宣布已就解决世界贸易组织有关葡萄酒的争端达成共识，并将对将于 2026 年到期的反倾销关税进行审查。

Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese kicks off a visit to China on Saturday, the first visit by a sitting Australian leader since 2016 as the trading partners continue to work on stabilising ties.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·艾博内塞周六开始对中国进行访问，这是澳大利亚在任领导人自 2016 年以来的首次访问，贸易伙伴继续致力于稳定关系。

The introduction of a 218% tax on most Australian wine introduced by China early in 2021 prompted that trade, previously valued as high as $1.2 billion annually, to collapse.翻译:中国于 2021 年初对大多数澳大利亚葡萄酒征收 218% 的关税，导致此前每年价值高达 12 亿美元的贸易崩溃。

Penfold's maker, Treasury Wine Estates, said in 2022 it had lost 97% of its China business due to the introduction of the tariffs, it's shares rose more than 5% on news they could soon be removed.翻译:奔富酒庄的制造商富邑葡萄酒集团 (Treasury Wine Estates) 表示，2022 年，由于关税的实施，该公司失去了 97% 的中国业务，因关税可能很快被取消的消息，该公司股价上涨了5% 以上。

Prior to Australia's call for an investigation into the origins of COVID-19 in 2020, Australian wines imported into China were subject to zero tariffs following the signing of a free trade agreement in 2015, giving them a 14% tariff advantage over many other wine producing nations.翻译:在澳大利亚于2020年呼吁对COVID-19起源进行调查之前，自2015年签署自由贸易协定以来，进口到中国的澳大利亚葡萄酒实行零关税，比许多其他葡萄酒生产国享有14%的关税优势国家。

Thompson is already in touch with the 10-plus Australian wineries he worked with before 2021, along with some newer players, in expectation that tariffs will soon be removed.翻译:汤普森已经与他在 2021 年之前合作过的 10 多家澳大利亚酒庄以及一些新加入的酒庄取得了联系，预计关税将很快取消。

Though he says this is good news, perhaps paving the way for the return of Australian wine to the Chinese market by early next year, he is not necessarily expecting business to bounce back immediately.翻译:尽管他表示这是个好消息，或许为澳大利亚葡萄酒明年初重返中国市场铺平了道路，但他并不一定期望业务会立即反弹。

"I don't think that's realistic any time soon. However, for a lot of good quality Australian wine producers ... customers still know the wines and I think will re-engage with those wines fairly readily," he said.翻译:“我认为这在短期内不太现实。然而，对于许多优质的澳大利亚葡萄酒生产商来说……顾客仍然了解这些葡萄酒，我认为他们会很容易地重新接触这些葡萄酒，”他说。

Layla Wang, co-owner of Trio Wine Bar in Beijing agreed that Chinese market perceptions of Australian wine haven't changed in the years since it was last available, with no clear winner in the battle to take over Australian wine's market share.翻译:北京 Trio Wine Bar 的合伙人 Layla Wang 也认为，自澳大利亚葡萄酒上次上市以来，中国市场对澳大利亚葡萄酒的看法多年来一直没有改变，在争夺澳大利亚葡萄酒市场份额的争夺战中没有明显的赢家。

The bar's small cellar is lined floor to ceiling with bottles of wine from all over the world, and Wang said the market has become more crowded as people seek out new and different wine experiences, leading to the increased popularity of homegrown Chinese wines, biodynamic and natural options.翻译:酒吧的小酒窖从地板到天花板都摆满了来自世界各地的葡萄酒，王说，随着人们寻求新的、不同的葡萄酒体验，市场变得更加拥挤，导致中国本土葡萄酒、生物动力和葡萄酒越来越受欢迎。自然选择。

"I think even if people have been away from Australian wine for a while, every time we talk about this category of wine, we all think it's a very good quality wine," Wang said, sat at her bar.翻译:“我认为，即使人们已经远离澳大利亚葡萄酒有一段时间了，每次我们谈论这类葡萄酒时，我们都认为这是一种品质非常好的葡萄酒，”王坐在她的酒吧里说道。

"For us, we're definitely delighted as it signifies offering more choices to our customers. For consumers who haven't had Australian wines for years, many will be eager to try them again."翻译:“对我们来说，我们绝对很高兴，因为这意味着为我们的客户提供更多选择。对于多年没有喝过澳大利亚葡萄酒的消费者来说，许多人会渴望再次尝试。”

Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔 编辑
item.author: Casey Hall, Xiaoyu Yin

item.title: 利率上涨，股市将迎来 2023 年最强劲的一周
item.description:
Summary:
  • MSCI World index +4.2%翻译:MSCI 世界指数 +4.2%
  • Aussie, kiwi eye strongest weekly gains in more than 4 months翻译:澳元和新西兰元创下四个多月以来最强劲的单周涨幅
  • U.S. payrolls due at 1230 GMT; Forecast for jobs +180k翻译:美国薪资将于 1230 GMT 到期；就业预测 +180k

Stocks were headed for their biggest weekly rise in a year on Friday, while bonds rallied and the dollar was on the back foot as investors cheered a pause in U.S. interest rate hikes.翻译:周五，股市将创下一年来最大单周涨幅，而债券则上涨，美元则处于不利地位，因为投资者对美国暂停加息感到高兴。

U.S. jobs data due later in the day is the next major focus.翻译:当天晚些时候公布的美国就业数据是下一个主要焦点。

Benchmark 10-year Treasury yields are down more than 20 basis points in two sessions since the U.S. Federal Reserve left rates on hold on Wednesday and Chair Jerome Powell said risks to the outlook for rates settings was balanced.翻译:自美联储周三维持利率不变且主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔表示利率设定前景面临的风险已平衡以来，基准10年期国债收益率在两个交易日内下跌了20多个基点。

Cash Treasuries were untraded in Asia owing to a holiday in Japan, and 10-year futures held recent gains to imply yields were steady at 4.67%. MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) rose 0.9%.翻译:由于日本假期，现金国债在亚洲未交易，10 年期期货保持近期涨幅，意味着收益率稳定在 4.67%。 MSCI 日本以外亚太地区最广泛股票指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)上涨 0.9%。

S&P 500 futures were 0.1% lower, weighed by a 3% fall for Apple (AAPL.O) shares in post-market trade after the tech giant's sales forecast fell short of expectations. European futures rose 0.4%.翻译:标准普尔 500 指数期货下跌 0.1%，因科技巨头苹果(AAPL.O)的销售预测未达到预期，其股价在盘后交易中下跌 3%。欧洲期货上涨0.4%。

World stocks (.MIWD00000PUS) are up 4.3% for the week so far, their largest weekly rise since November 2022.翻译:迄今为止，全球股市(.MIWD00000PUS)本周上涨 4.3%，这是自 2022 年 11 月以来的最大单周涨幅。

"Markets have become increasingly confident that rates in the U.S. have now peaked," said ANZ analysts in a note.翻译:澳新银行分析师在一份报告中表示：“市场对美国利率现已见顶越来越有信心。”

"As logical as that is ... Powell did warn that for higher bond yields to forestall another hike, they'd need to stay high, so markets can't have their proverbial cake and eat it too."翻译:“尽管这是合乎逻辑的……鲍威尔确实警告说，为了防止再次加息，债券收益率需要保持在高位，这样市场就不能鱼与熊掌兼得。”

The U.S. Treasury department had also said on Wednesday that it would sell less longer-dated debt at auction than had been expected and a softer-than-forecast manufacturing survey helped reinforce bets that no further hikes are necessary.翻译:美国财政部周三还表示，将在拍卖中出售的较长期债券数量少于预期，而制造业调查数据弱于预期，这也增强了人们对没有必要进一步加息的押注。

On Thursday, the Bank of England also left interest rates on hold and stressed it did not expect to cut them any time soon.翻译:周四， 英国央行也维持利率不变，并强调预计不会很快降息。

Ten-year gilts had their sharpest rally in more than a month, sending yields almost 12 basis points lower to 4.39%. Ten-year German bund yields also fell on Thursday, though only by 4.6 bps to 2.71%.翻译:十年期英国国债出现一个多月以来的最大涨幅，导致收益率下跌近 12 个基点至 4.39%。德国十年期国债收益率周四也下跌，但仅下跌 4.6 个基点至 2.71%。

"It felt like there were a decent chunk of investors waiting on the sidelines and ready to play lower yields and yesterday removed a couple of potential stumbling blocks to enacting that view," said Rabobank analysts.翻译:荷兰合作银行分析师表示，“感觉有相当多的投资者在观望，准备降低收益率，昨天消除了实施这一观点的几个潜在障碍。”

PAYROLLS LOOM

In foreign exchange markets the Australian and New Zealand dollars look set to turn in their strongest weekly gains since July, with rises of 1.5% and 1.6% so far.翻译:在外汇市场，澳元和新西兰元有望迎来自 7 月份以来最强劲的单周涨幅，迄今为止分别上涨 1.5% 和 1.6%。

The Aussie , steady at $0.6413 on Friday, has been helped by a third-quarter inflation surprise that has traders betting on a rate hike from the Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) on Tuesday and the kiwi is rising with the tide.翻译:澳元周五稳定在 0.6413 美元，受到第三季度通胀意外的帮助，交易员押注澳大利亚储备银行 (RBA) 周二加息，新西兰元也随之上涨。

"From here on, AUD’s downside may be limited as we expect the extensive set of policy support from Chinese authorities to help support the yuan and hence by extension, the AUD," said strategists at Singapore's UOB.翻译:新加坡大华银行策略师表示，“从现在开始，澳元的下行空间可能有限，因为我们预计中国当局将提供广泛的政策支持，以帮助支撑人民币，进而支撑澳元。”

"In addition, broad USD weakness as the Fed ends its rate hike cycle is likely to spur an AUD/USD recovery."翻译:“此外，随着美联储结束加息周期，美元普遍走软可能会刺激澳元/美元复苏。”

The next catalyst for currency movements is likely to be U.S. jobs data. Economists polled by Reuters expect the U.S. to have added 180,000 jobs in October.翻译:货币走势的下一个催化剂可能是美国就业数据。路透社调查的经济学家预计美国10月份将增加18万个就业岗位。

The worst performing G10 currencies for the week have been the havens of Japanese yen and the Swiss franc as investors have sought out riskier assets.翻译:由于投资者纷纷寻找风险较高的资产，本周表现最差的 G10 货币是日元和瑞士法郎的避险货币。

The Bank of Japan will continue to dismantle its ultra-easy monetary policy next year, six sources familiar with the BOJ's thinking told Reuters, though the slow progress has been cold comfort for a yen weighed down by Japan's low interest rates.翻译:六位熟悉日本央行想法的消息人士告诉路透社，日本央行明年将继续取消其超宽松货币政策，不过进展缓慢对因日本低利率打压的日元来说是一个冰冷的安慰。

It traded steady at 150.28 per dollar on Friday. Brent crude futures are 3.7% lower on the week to $87.10 a barrel. Gold is down 1% at $1,986 an ounce.翻译:周五其交易稳定在 1 美元兑 150.28 美元。布伦特原油期货本周下跌 3.7%，至每桶 87.10 美元。黄金下跌 1%，至每盎司 1,986 美元。

Bitcoin , meanwhile, looks to be reviving momentum that had collapsed along with exchange FTX in 2022. FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried was found guilty of stealing from customers on Thursday. There was no immediate market reaction, leaving bitcoin to hold steep recent gains at $34,450.翻译:与此同时，比特币似乎正在恢复 2022 年 FTX 交易所崩溃的势头。FTX 创始人Sam Bankman-Fried 于周四被判犯有盗窃客户罪。市场没有立即做出反应，导致比特币近期涨幅保持在 34,450 美元。

Reporting by Tom Westbrook; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Miral Fahmy翻译:汤姆·威斯布鲁克报道；编辑：Jacqueline Wong 和 Miral Fahmy
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 随着关系升温，澳大利亚阿尔巴内斯将在中国访问中强调贸易
item.description:
Prime Minister Anthony Albanese will highlight trade as an anchor for stabilising ties when he makes the first visit by an Australian leader to China in seven years, as badly strained relations move back to an even footing, business leaders said.翻译:商界领袖表示，随着澳大利亚领导人七年来首次访华，澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞将强调贸易是稳定关系的支柱，因为严重紧张的关系已恢复平衡。

Albanese, who arrives on Saturday, will attend the opening of China's top imports fair in Shanghai, and speak to a large business delegation, the following day.翻译:阿尔巴内塞于周六抵达，将出席在上海举行的中国顶级进口博览会的开幕式，并于次日向一个大型商业代表团发表讲话。

He has said he also will raise concerns over rising tension in the South China Sea in a meeting with President Xi Jinping in Beijing on Monday.翻译:他表示，他还将在周一与中国国家主席习近平在北京会面时提出对南海紧张局势升级的担忧。

His government has taken credit for stabilising ties with Australia's largest trading partner since coming to office last year, as China lifted most trade blocks imposed in a 2020 diplomatic dispute that cost A$20 billion in commodity and food exports.翻译:自去年上任以来，他的政府因稳定与澳大利亚最大贸易伙伴的关系而受到赞誉，中国取消了2020年外交争端中施加的大部分贸易封锁，该争端导致大宗商品和食品出口损失200亿澳元。

Even as Australia moves closer to security ally the United States, which has agreed to sell Canberra nuclear-powered submarines under a trilateral defence technology partnership, AUKUS, with Britain, and boosted military exercises, Albanese has emphasised the importance of better dialogue with Beijing.翻译:尽管澳大利亚与安全盟友美国走得更近，美国已同意根据与英国的三边防御技术伙伴关系AUKUS 向堪培拉出售核动力潜艇，并加强军事演习，但阿尔巴内斯仍然强调与北京加强对话的重要性。

"China is the source of our greatest security anxiety ... China is also our largest partner and we do value a productive relationship," Defence Minister Richard Marles told reporters in Washington this week.翻译:“中国是我们最大的安全焦虑的根源......中国也是我们最大的合作伙伴，我们确实重视富有成效的关系，”国防部长理查德·马勒斯本周在华盛顿对记者说。

A quarter of Australia's export earnings come from China, more than the next three trade partners, the United States, South Korea and Japan combined, Albanese said on Tuesday.翻译:阿尔巴内斯周二表示，澳大利亚四分之一的出口收入来自中国，超过了紧随其后的三个贸易伙伴美国、韩国和日本的总和。

"Trade as an anchor provides stability and certainty to allow greater engagement while we navigate uncertain currents and obstacles that lie beneath," said Australia China Business Council president David Olsson.翻译:澳中贸易全国委员会主席戴维·奥尔森 (David Olsson) 表示：“贸易作为锚点提供了稳定性和确定性，使我们能够在应对潜在的不确定潮流和障碍的同时进行更多的接触。”

More than 250 Australian companies will exhibit at China's International Import Expo (CIIE) in Shanghai, to be opened by Premier Li Qiang on Sunday, showcasing products that were top sellers in China before trade hurdles were imposed - seafood, beef and wine - as well as the iron ore exporters that dominate Australia's trade to China, Fortescue Metals (FMG.AX), Rio Tinto and BHP (BHP.AX) .翻译:超过 250 家澳大利亚公司将参加在上海举行的中国国际进口博览会 (CIIE)，该博览会将于周日由李强总理主持开幕，展示贸易壁垒实施前在中国最畅销的产品——海鲜、牛肉和葡萄酒。作为主导澳大利亚对华贸易的铁矿石出口商，福蒂斯丘金属公司(FMG.AX) 、力拓公司和必和必拓(BHP.AX) 。

"The prime minister's attendance at CIIE and the signal it sends to the Chinese system and business community, is likely to result in more positive attitudes toward Australia as a trade partner," Olsson said.翻译:奥尔森表示：“总理出席进博会及其向中国体系和商界发出的信号，可能会导致人们对澳大利亚作为贸易伙伴的态度更加积极。”

Chairman of the Business Council of Australia's global engagement committee, Warwick Smith, said Albanese would highlight the complementary nature of bilateral trade in a speech on Sunday to 500 business people.翻译:澳大利亚商业理事会全球参与委员会主席沃里克·史密斯 (Warwick Smith) 表示，阿尔巴尼斯将在周日向 500 名商界人士发表的演讲中强调双边贸易的互补性。

"It is important that dialogue has resumed," he said.翻译:“恢复对话很重要，”他说。

DIFFICULT TOPICS

China has lauded the visit's timing, on the 50th anniversary of the first to China by an Australian leader, then Prime Minister Gough Whitlam.翻译:中国对此次访问的时机表示赞赏，适逢澳大利亚领导人、时任总理高夫·惠特拉姆首次访华50周年。

But despite the positive tone, Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong has said ties won't return to where they were even 15 years ago, when Chinese investment surged into the economy.翻译:但尽管语气积极，澳大利亚外交部长黄英贤表示，两国关系不会回到 15 年前中国投资涌入经济时的水平。

Australia has blocked two Chinese investments in rare earth miners this year on national interest grounds, and in Washington last week, Albanese sought to boost U.S. investment in Australia's minerals sector, to reduce reliance on China.翻译:澳大利亚今年以国家利益为由阻止了中国对稀土矿商的两项投资， 上周在华盛顿，阿尔巴内塞寻求增加美国对澳大利亚矿产行业的投资，以减少对中国的依赖。

China's ambassador, Xiao Qian, in an Australian newspaper column on Friday, said ties were at a "critical juncture of setting off and sailing off again", and urged more cooperation in "such traditional areas as energy, mining, agriculture, education and tourism".翻译:中国大使肖千周五在澳大利亚一家报纸专栏中表示，两国关系正处于“启程和再次扬帆的关键时刻”，并敦促在“能源、矿业、农业、教育和旅游等传统领域开展更多合作” ”。

Asia Society Australia executive director Richard Maude, a former diplomat who wrote Australia's 2017 foreign policy white paper, said the list of difficult topics for the Australian and Chinese leaders was long.翻译:澳大利亚亚洲协会执行董事理查德·莫德（Richard Maude）是澳大利亚2017年外交政策白皮书的前外交官，他表示，澳大利亚和中国领导人面临的难题清单很长。

"The South China Sea and especially China's attempts to force the Philippines off Second Thomas Shoal will have to be high on the agenda, but the prime minister will also need to make it clear that any attempt to force unification with Taiwan will carry severe consequences," said Maude.翻译:“南海问题，特别是中国迫使菲律宾离开仁爱礁的企图必须成为重要议程，但总理还需要明确表示，任何强迫与台湾统一的企图都将带来严重后果， “莫德说。

Although the Albanese government has put dialogue at the centre of its approach to China, most policy remains the same, he said.翻译:他说，尽管阿尔巴尼亚政府已将对话置于其对华政策的核心，但大多数政策保持不变。

"On the defence front, the Albanese government has doubled down on supporting America build the fabric of military deterrence across the Indo-Pacific. That duality of approach is quite evident to China," he said.翻译:“在国防方面，阿尔巴尼亚政府加倍努力支持美国在印度-太平洋地区建立军事威慑结构。这种双重性对中国来说非常明显，”他说。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:科斯蒂·李约瑟报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 全球金融首脑将在香港峰会上面临更严厉的中国问题
item.description:
Global investment bank and asset manager chiefs are reuniting in Hong Kong next week amid geopolitical tensions and China's economic slowdown, seeking to redefine their position in the world's second-largest economy and its offshore financial hub.翻译:在地缘政治紧张局势和中国经济放缓之际，全球投资银行和资产管理公司高管下周将在香港重聚，寻求重新定义他们在全球第二大经济体及其离岸金融中心的地位。

The Global Financial Leaders Investment Summit, a flagship event hosted by the Hong Kong Monetary Authority, begins on Monday with participants including Goldman Sachs (GS.N) Chief Executive David Solomon, Morgan Stanley (MS.N) boss James Gorman, Citigroup's (C.N) Jane Fraser, as well as HSBC's (HSBA.L) Noel Quinn and Standard Chartered's (STAN.L) Bill Winters.翻译:由香港金融管理局主办的旗舰活动全球金融领袖投资峰会于周一开幕，与会者包括高盛(GS.N)首席执行官大卫·所罗门 (David Solomon)、摩根士丹利(MS.N)总裁詹姆斯·戈尔曼 (James Gorman)、花旗集团(CN ) 首席执行官詹姆斯·戈尔曼 (James Gorman) 等。 ）简·弗雷泽（Jane Fraser），以及汇丰银行（HSBA.L）的诺埃尔·奎因（Noel Quinn）和渣打银行（STAN.L）的比尔·温特斯（Bill Winters）。

The heads of Blackstone Group, Carlyle Group, Citadel and others will also speak at the event, which focuses on the main theme of "living with complexity".翻译:黑石集团、凯雷集团、Citadel 等公司的负责人也将在活动上发表讲话，活动围绕“复杂生活”的主题。

The executives are coming to Hong Kong as the city has shed hundreds of banking and asset management jobs because of the slowdown in China dealmaking and the tightened regulatory grip on the market since the inaugural summit last year. That meeting was billed as Hong Kong's comeback as a global financial hub following the disruptions of the COVID-19 pandemic.翻译:这些高管即将来到香港，因为自去年首届峰会以来，由于中国交易放缓以及对市场的监管收紧，香港已经裁掉了数百个银行和资产管理职位。这次会议被认为是香港在受到新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行破坏后重新成为全球金融中心的标志。

"The main question in the mind of everybody when they come to Hong Kong is how is the Chinese economy performing and what would be the swings coming from there," said Diana Parusheva-Lowery, head of public policy and sustainable finance at the Asia Securities Industry & Financial Markets Association in Hong Kong.翻译:亚洲证券公共政策和可持续金融主管戴安娜·帕鲁舍娃-洛厄里(Diana Parusheva-Lowery)表示：“每个人来到香港时，脑子里的主要问题是中国经济表现如何，以及随之而来的波动是什么。”香港工业及金融市场协会。

The Hong Kong Stock Exchange is only the 11th-largest venue for initial public offerings this year, with merely $2.7 billion raised through the third quarter, a shadow of its top position in most of the last decade. The territory's assets under management fell by 14% in 2022, official data showed.翻译:香港证券交易所仅是今年第 11 大首次公开募股交易场所，第三季度仅筹集了 27 亿美元，与其在过去十年大部分时间里排名第一的地位相形见绌。官方数据显示，2022 年该地区管理的资产下降了 14%。

Trading volumes have also slumped as foreign investors reduce exposure to a China they view as increasingly isolated by its opaque policies, struggling property sector and crackdowns on private enterprise.翻译:由于外国投资者认为中国因不透明的政策、陷入困境的房地产业和对私营企业的打击而日益孤立，因此减少了对中国的投资，交易量也大幅下降。

"The structural slowdown in China's economy, the omnipresent risk that U.S.-China relations might take another leg down in the future, the questions about whether private mainland money now prefers Singapore, none of that has really changed," said Chris Beddor, Gavekal Dragonomics' deputy China research director based in Hong Kong.翻译:龙洲经讯的 Chris Beddor 表示：“中国经济的结构性放缓、中美关系未来可能再次下滑的普遍风险、大陆私人资金现在是否更青睐新加坡的问题，这些都没有真正改变。”驻香港的中国研究副总监。

"And senior people in the financial sector are keenly aware of those issues, even if they don't discuss them publicly," Beddor said.翻译:贝多尔说：“金融领域的资深人士敏锐地意识到这些问题，即使他们没有公开讨论这些问题。”

STRING OF LAYOFFS

Hong Kong's financial job market, which saw an exodus of foreign employees during COVID, is unlikely to recover in the near term amid a challenging operating environment, recruiters and industry insiders say.翻译:招聘人员和业内人士表示，在新冠疫情期间，香港的金融就业市场出现了外籍员工大量外流的情况，但由于经营环境充满挑战，短期内不太可能恢复。

Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley and J.P. Morgan have trimmed dozens of bankers based in Hong Kong and mainland China this year, with key China dealmakers among those laid off.翻译:高盛、摩根士丹利和摩根大通今年已裁减了驻香港和中国大陆的数十名银行家，其中包括主要的中国交易撮合者。

The surprise merger between Swiss banking rivals UBS and Credit Suisse resulted in a brutal 80% reduction in the Credit Suisse investment banking staff in Hong Kong in August.翻译:瑞士银行业竞争对手瑞银集团(UBS)和瑞士信贷银行(Credit Suisse)出人意料地合并，导致瑞士信贷银行(Credit Suisse)在香港的投资银行员工8月份大幅裁员80% 。

Canada's largest pension fund CPP Investments also cut a number of Hong Kong-based staff members.翻译:加拿大最大的养老基金CPP Investments也裁减了多名香港员工。

John Mullally, recruiter Robert Walters' Hong Kong managing director, said hiring in private banking remains active, helped by wealth coming out of China to Hong Kong after the border reopened.翻译:招聘人员罗伯特·沃尔特斯(Robert Walters)香港董事总经理约翰·穆拉利(John Mulally)表示，私人银行业的招聘仍然活跃，这得益于边境重新开放后财富从中国流入香港。

Hong Kong needs to be aware of competition from rival financial hub Singapore but Mullally expects Hong Kong to "regain some of the ground lost" despite the depressed dealmaking and trading.翻译:香港需要意识到来自竞争对手金融中心新加坡的竞争，但穆拉利预计，尽管交易和贸易低迷，香港仍将“收复部分失地”。

(This story has been refiled to correct the spelling of CPP Investments in paragraph 13)翻译:（本文已重新归档，以更正第 13 段中 CPP Investments 的拼写）

Reporting by Kane Wu in Hong Kong and Scott Murdoch in Sydney; additional reporting by Selena Li and Xie Yu; Editing by Christian Schmollinger翻译:吴凯恩 (Kane Wu) 在香港的报道和斯科特·默多克 (Scott Murdoch) 在悉尼的报道； Selena Li 和 Xie Yu 的补充报道；克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑
item.author: Kane Wu, Scott Murdoch

item.title: 朝鲜确认关闭大使馆以提高外交效率
item.description:
North Korea confirmed on Friday it is shutting some embassies in an effort to "rearrange its diplomatic capacity efficiently", closures that South Korea says indicates the North is struggling under the burden of sanctions.翻译:朝鲜周五确认将关闭一些大使馆，以“有效地重新调整其外交能力”，韩国称关闭表明朝鲜正在制裁的重担下苦苦挣扎。

North Korea is poised to close as many as a dozen embassies including ones in Spain, Hong Kong, and various countries in Africa, according to media reports and analysts, which could mean the closure of nearly 25% of its missions worldwide.翻译:据媒体报道和分析人士称，朝鲜准备关闭多达12 个大使馆，包括驻西班牙、香港和非洲各国的大使馆，这可能意味着其在全球近 25% 的使馆将被关闭。

A North Korean foreign ministry spokesperson confirmed in comments on the ministry website that some missions were closing while adding that new ones were opening.翻译:朝鲜外交部发言人在外交部网站上发表评论时证实，一些使团正在关闭，同时补充说新的使团正在开放。

"We are carrying out operations to withdraw and establish diplomatic missions in accordance with changing global environments and national foreign policy," the spokesperson said, calling it normal activity, and without giving any details.翻译:发言人表示，“我们正在根据国际环境变化和国家外交政策，开展撤、建外交使团行动”，称这是正常活动，但没有透露任何细节。

North Korea, facing extensive sanctions over its nuclear and missile programmes, manages to maintain business ties and friendly diplomatic relations with a dwindling number of Cold War-era friends.翻译:朝鲜因其核计划和导弹计划而面临广泛制裁，但仍设法与数量不断减少的冷战时期朋友保持着商业关系和友好外交关系。

North Korean missions have at times engaged in illicit activities, according to international sanctions monitors, to raise cash to fund their operations and to send back to Pyongyang.翻译:据国际制裁监察员称，朝鲜使团有时会从事非法活动，以筹集现金为其行动提供资金并送回平壤。

South Korea's unification ministry, which handles relations with the North, said this week North Korea's closure of some diplomatic missions was a sign it is struggling to make money overseas because of international sanctions.翻译:负责处理与朝鲜关系的韩国统一部本周表示，朝鲜关闭了一些外交使团，这表明朝鲜因国际制裁而难以在海外赚钱。

Reporting by Ju-min Park; Editing by Robert Birsel翻译:朴柱民报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 财新PMI显示10月中国服务业活动小幅回升
item.description:
China's services activity expanded at a slightly faster pace in October, a private-sector survey showed on Friday, with sales growing at the softest rate in 10 months and employment stagnating as business confidence waned.翻译:周五的一项私营部门调查显示，中国 10 月份服务业活动扩张速度略快，销售增速创 10 个月来最低水平，且随着商业信心减弱，就业停滞。

The vast services sector, which provides about 48% of jobs in China, enjoyed a strong rebound earlier this year but analysts say the sluggish household income growth and uncertain job market raise questions over the sustainability of the industry's growth.翻译:庞大的服务业提供了中国约48%的就业机会，今年早些时候出现了强劲反弹，但分析人士表示，家庭收入增长缓慢和就业市场的不确定性引发了人们对该行业增长可持续性的质疑。

The Caixin/S&P Global services purchasing managers' index (PMI) rose to 50.4 in October from September's nine-month low of 50.2. The pace of expansion also remained much slower than seen on average in the first half of the year.翻译:10 月份财新/标普全球服务业采购经理人指数 (PMI) 从 9 月份的 9 个月低点 50.2 升至 50.4。扩张速度也仍远低于上半年的平均水平。

The 50-point mark separates expansion from contraction in activity.翻译:50 分是经济活动扩张与收缩的分界线。

An official survey showed on Tuesday that services PMI dropped to 50.1 from 50.9 in September.翻译:周二的官方调查显示，服务业 PMI 从 9 月份的 50.9 降至 50.1。

"The services sector, which is highly related to youth employment, recovered 90% to pre-COVID levels," said Xing Zhaopeng, senior China strategist at ANZ.翻译:澳新银行高级中国策略师邢兆鹏表示：“与青年就业高度相关的服务业已恢复至新冠疫情前水平90%。”

However, "it is unlikely to see a rebound beyond expectation in the sector," he added.翻译:然而，“该行业不太可能出现超出预期的反弹，”他补充道。

New orders in the services sector last month rose at the weakest pace in 10 months, the Caixin survey showed, offsetting the bump higher from a travel boom seen during the eight-day National Day holiday.翻译:财新调查显示，上个月服务业新订单增速为 10 个月以来最弱，抵消了国庆八天假期旅行热潮带来的增长。

However, there was further improvement in foreign demand for Chinese services amid reports of increased amounts of overseas visitors.翻译:然而，随着海外游客数量的增加，国外对中国服务的需求进一步改善。

The slowdown in sales growth led to companies' more cautious approach to recruitment. Employment in the sector was unchanged in October, having expanded in each of the previous eight months.翻译:销售增长放缓导致企业对招聘采取更加谨慎的态度。该行业的就业人数在 10 月份没有变化，在过去八个月中逐年扩大。

Amid subdued demand, overall optimism slipped for the fourth month in a row and was the lowest since March 2020.翻译:由于需求低迷，整体乐观情绪连续第四个月下滑，为 2020 年 3 月以来的最低水平。

Prices charged by services companies grew at a faster pace as they sought to pass on higher input costs to customers, though the rate of input inflation was the slowest since June 2022.翻译:尽管投入通胀率是 2022 年 6 月以来最慢的，但服务公司寻求将更高的投入成本转嫁给客户，因此其收取的价格增长较快。

Caixin/S&P's composite PMI, which includes both manufacturing and services activity, declined to 50.0 from 50.9 in September, marking the lowest reading since December 2022.翻译:财新/标普综合 PMI（包括制造业和服务业活动）从 9 月份的 50.9 降至 50.0，创下 2022 年 12 月以来的最低读数。

"The market conditions for manufacturing were more sluggish compared with the services sector," said Wang Zhe, economist at Caixin Insight Group.翻译:财新智库经济学家王哲表示：“与服务业相比，制造业的市场状况更加低迷。”

China's economy staged better-than-expected growth in the third quarter, but economists say the weak property sector, fading demand for travel, local government debt and geopolitical tensions may weigh on the outlook.翻译:中国经济第三季度的增长好于预期，但经济学家表示，房地产行业疲软、旅游需求下降、地方政府债务和地缘政治紧张局势可能会给经济前景带来压力。

Reporting by Ellen Zhang and Ryan Woo. Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:张艾伦和吴瑞安报道。山姆·霍姆斯编辑
item.author: Reuters
